title: bring back doom bots
body: i loved doom bots and i would love for it to come back even if its just for a couple of weeks please bring it back

replies.body: I watched the video of the casters (Rivington, Phreak, Kobe, Jatt & Zirene) vs the Doom Bots and it was honestly hilarious. I'd love to play it. I agree, bring back Doom Bots!
Never played doombots but I'd like to, I agree
Agreed i really loved this mode XD!
Out of all the game modes this is the one that inspired the most teamwork!
